templates.template:
<xf:textboxrow name="options[shop_id]" value="{$profile.options.shop_id}" label="{{ phrase('wh1_pg_cryptocloud_shop_id') }}" hint="{{ phrase('required') }}"> </xf:textboxrow>
<xf:passwordboxrow name="options[secret_key]" value="{$profile.options.secret_key}" type="password" label="{{ phrase('wh1_pg_cryptocloud_secret_key') }}" hint="{{ phrase('required') }}"> </xf:passwordboxrow>
<xf:passwordboxrow name="options[api_key]" value="{$profile.options.api_key}" type="password" label="{{ phrase('wh1_pg_cryptocloud_api_key') }}" hint="{{ phrase('required') }}"> </xf:passwordboxrow>
